name: Mega Ramp Power Speed
description:
Speed up the car on the impossible tracks of the longest mega ramp. Experience the thrilling racing on the biggest ramp. No worries, try muscle cars, mountain cars or you can even try huge trucks and monster truck vehicles. If you still looking for more fun or ready to have great stunt driving then we also have train driving take off on the mega ramp with high speed demolishing and crushing all other cars or trucks on the way. Drive astonishing stunt cars through crazy heights and grand paths! Be the best driver against your rivals. Ride your muscle auto on the deadly tracks and prove yourself as the best driver. Be a furious driver and do drifting and crashing in this auto action packed game. But the only enemies are the time and the obstacles. To perform this stunt, tighten your seatbelt and enjoy loads of grand while climbing massive heights but try not fall otherwise you will lose.
Features:
- Multiple Challenging levels for all type of players
- Beautiful cars to drive and enjoy mega ramp drive
- Eye-catching 3D graphics and amazing sound effects
- Realistic stunt tricks and smooth drive on ramps.
- Addictive gameplay with background music
- And much more.
